BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Angela M. Battaglia to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the Landmarks Preservation Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 3020 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Angela M. Battaglia, Landmarks Preservation Commission

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Angela M. Battaglia to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the Landmarks Preservation Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 3020 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
